00033 
00034 #include "dev/radio-sensor.h"
00035 #include "dev/irq.h"
00036 #include "dev/tr1001.h"
00037 #include <io.h>
00038 
00039 const struct sensors_sensor radio_sensor;
00040 
00041 unsigned int radio_sensor_signal;
00042 
00043 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 static int
00045 irq(void)
00046 {
00047   radio_sensor_signal = ADC12MEM5;
00048   return 0;
00049 }
00050 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 static int
00052 value(int type)
00053 {
00054   switch(type) {
00055   case RADIO_SENSOR_LAST_PACKET:
00056     return tr1001_sstrength();
00057   case RADIO_SENSOR_LAST_VALUE:
00058   default:
00059     return radio_sensor_signal;
00060   }
00061 }
00062 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 static int
00064 configure(int type, int value)
00065 {
00066   switch(type) {
00067   case SENSORS_HW_INIT:
00068     /* Initialization of ADC12 done by irq */
00069     radio_sensor_signal = 0;
00070     return 1;
00071   case SENSORS_ACTIVE:
00072     if(value) {
00073       if(!irq_adc12_active(5)) {
00074         irq_adc12_activate(5, (INCH_5 + SREF_0), irq);
00075       }
00076     } else {
00077       irq_adc12_deactivate(5);
00078       radio_sensor_signal = 0;
00079     }
00080     return 1;
00081   }
00082   return 0;
00083 }
00084 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 static int
00086 status(int type)
00087 {
00088   switch(type) {
00089   case SENSORS_ACTIVE:
00090   case SENSORS_READY:
00091     return irq_adc12_active(5);
00092   }
00093   return 0;
00094 }
00095 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00096 SENSORS_SENSOR(radio_sensor, RADIO_SENSOR,
00097                value, configure, status);
Generated on Tue May 8 2012 20:13:11 for Contiki 2.5 by  1.7.4
